title: Summer course
content: Do we have to take up a summer course even if we have taken special topics in both 3rd and 4th sem ? And how many credits do the 5 and 6th semesters consist of ?

comments.body: Ask your mentor/ some teacher as to what is the credit requirements for your batch . For the current 6th sem peeps ,we had no choice but to do summer courses as no special topics were offered during second year (except for cie in RR, which had a very small intake)
